Package com.atak.plugins.impl

Interface IToolbarItem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPluginTool
    public interface IToolbarItem

    • Method Detail

      • getShortDescription

        java.lang.String getShortDescription()
        Returns:
        the short name for this tool. return getDescription() if unsure

      • getIcon

        android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getIcon()
        The icon used to populate the Tool within the Toolbar. If this is a layer drawable the first layer is applied the shadowing and the subsequent layers can be controlled by the plugin for overlay purposes such as message counts or other on screen indicators.
        Returns:
        The icon for this tool/layer/item

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns:
        the name for this tool/layer/item

      • onItemEvent

        void onItemEvent​(MotionEvent event)
        Called when a motion event (e.g. click, long press, hover, etc.) occurs for the associated toolbar item.
        Parameters:
        event - The motion event that triggered the callback
